archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.1.3g: g) providing fail secure systems where, in the event of a system failure, information is not accessible to unauthorised individuals, and cannot be tampered with or modified.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
